name: Art Kit
description: This Kit has been commissioned collectively by the Art on Your Doorstep galleries and conceived, designed and manufactured by the artists David Chatton-Barker and Simon Persighetti. It is a tool to assist investigating the gallery and can be used with any exhibition. It is great for using as a starting point for any engaged activity, suitable for any age and for any length of time. Ideal for teachers, families, solitary gallery visitors, artists...the list can go on. The Kit contains 30 prompt cards which are intended to inspire interatction with the gallery and the art work, providing inroads to contemporary art that are sometimes difficult to find. There is also a selection of seemingly random items that could be useful to play with in the gallery space.
